```{r app}
code <- 'library(shiny)
ui <- fluidPage(sliderInput("n","Bins",1,50,30), plotOutput("p"))
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$p <- renderPlot(hist(rnorm(1000), breaks=input$n))
}
shinyApp(ui, server)'
url <- roxy.shinylive::create_shinylive_url(code)
url

```
